Offer

Custom development

  • Technical blueprint and proof-of-concept.
  • Quick iteration cycles and total transparency.
  • Portfolio of selected technologies available.

Training and mentoring

  • Training on specific technologies or paradigms.
  • Mentoring before inception or during a project fase.
  • Assess your team and identify development opportunities.

Technical leadership

  • Help developing a technical blueprint.
  • Periodical meetings with development team and stakeholders.
  • Hands-on troubleshooting.

Technology

Scala

  • The most advanced industry-grade backend language for the Java ecosystem
  • Adopted by industry leaders in Finance, Publishing and Social Media
  • Ideal to transition to big-data processing thanks to Spark

Python

  • A rich common ground for scientists and programmers
  • The fastest way to go from research to production
  • Ability to run on the cloud as serverless or with PySpark

Serverless

  • Deployment on Google Functions or AWS Lambda
  • Development of rich applications on the browser

Excel

  • Development of rich interface with WebComponents and PureScript
  • Serverless option

Rust

  • Desktop or server side heavy processing
  • Low latency: no garbage collection
  • Memory and thread safety

Business Domains

Systematic trading

  • We can help with all the stages of systematic trading, from data gathering and cleaning to execution system and performance evaluation.

Risk management

  • Interfacing with position keeping and portfolio management tools, we can develop personalised stress tests and scenario matrices, with cloud-based concurrent evaluation and advanced visualisation options.

Derivative pricing

  • Scala implementation of advanced numerical methods for derivative pricing.
  • Experience with high-performance equity volatility derivatives evaluation on AWS.
